item.name: Input_Line_Bad
item.description: Input line bad, counter of bad lines

trigger.expression: ( ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_DISASTER} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_DISASTER} ) or ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_DISASTER} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_DISASTER} ) or ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_DISASTER} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_DISASTER} ) ) = 1
trigger.name: UPS - {HOST.NAME} - at Output Phase Load DISASTER ({ITEM.VALUE1}, {ITEM.VALUE2}, {ITEM.VALUE6})
trigger.description:
12% - symetry lost per phase
Coefficent set at macro sheet MAX3PHLOAD = 1.2 MIN3PHLOAD = 0.8

trigger.name: UPS - {HOST.NAME} - Detect Bad Lines
trigger.description: Check Line state, Some having 0 Volts.

trigger.expression: ({UPS Systems View SNMP:UPS_Input_Voltage_L1.last()} = 0 or {UPS Systems View SNMP:UPS_Input_Voltage_L2.last()}=0 or {UPS Systems View SNMP:UPS_Input_Voltage_L3.last()} = 0) = 1
trigger.name: UPS - {HOST.NAME} - Input Voltage is ({ITEM.VALUE1}, {ITEM.VALUE2}, {ITEM.VALUE3})

trigger.expression: ({UPS Systems View SNMP:UPS_Output_Voltage_L1.last()} < {$V_IN_MIN} or {UPS Systems View SNMP:UPS_Output_Voltage_L2.last()} < {$V_IN_MIN} or {UPS Systems View SNMP:UPS_Output_Voltage_L3.last()} < {$V_IN_MIN}) = 1
trigger.name: UPS - {HOST.NAME} - Output Voltage is: ({ITEM.VALUE1}, {ITEM.VALUE2}, {ITEM.VALUE3})

trigger.expression: ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Input_Frequency.last()} > 52 or {UPS Systems View SNMP:Input_Frequency.last()} < 48 ) = 1
trigger.name: UPS - {HOST.NAME} AC Frequency is {ITEM.VALUE1}

trigger.expression:
( ( ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} ) or ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} ) or ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} ) ) = 1 )
and not (
( ( ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} ) or ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} ) or ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_AVERAGE} ) ) = 1 )
and
( ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_DISASTER} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_DISASTER} ) or ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_DISASTER} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L2.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_DISASTER} ) or ( ({UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} ) > {$MAX3PHLOAD_DISASTER} or ( {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L3.last()} / {UPS Systems View SNMP:Output_Percent_Load_L1.last()} ) < {$MIN3PHLOAD_DISASTER} ) ) = 1 )
trigger.name: UPS - {HOST.NAME} Average Balance at Output Phase Load ({ITEM.VALUE1}, {ITEM.VALUE2}, {ITEM.VALUE6})
trigger.description:
10% - symetry lost per phase
Coefficent set at macro sheet MAX3PHLOAD = 1.1 MIN3PHLOAD = 0.9
